survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee participation and satisfaction with the current corporate wellness program to identify areas for improvement and increase engagement.

questions.question_text: How familiar are you with the corporate wellness program offered by your employer?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 4-point Likert scale to measure familiarity levels. Ensure mobile-friendly layout for easy selection.

script.question_text: How familiar are you with the corporate wellness program offered by your employer?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: Which of the following wellness program activities have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears if respondent selects 'Very familiar' or 'Somewhat familiar' in Q1.
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select options. Randomize the order of options to avoid bias.

script.question_text: Which of the following wellness program activities have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears if respondent selects 'Very familiar' or 'Somewhat familiar' in Q1.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the wellness program activities you have participated in?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears if respondent selects at least one activity in Q2.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale to measure satisfaction. Include a 'Not applicable' option if needed.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the wellness program activities you have participated in?
script.routing_logic: This question appears if respondent selects at least one activity in Q2.

questions.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from participating in the wellness program?
answer_options: Program activities not relevant to me
questions.routing_logic: This question appears if respondent selects 'Not very familiar' or 'Not familiar at all' in Q1 or 'None of the above' in Q2.
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional comments.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with an open-text option.

script.question_text: What barriers, if any, prevent you from participating in the wellness program?
answer_options: Program activities not relevant to me
script.routing_logic: This question appears if respondent selects 'Not very familiar' or 'Not familiar at all' in Q1 or 'None of the above' in Q2.

questions.question_text: Which of the following benefits would motivate you to participate in the wellness program? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Randomize the order of options to reduce order bias. Include an 'Other' option for additional feedback.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes with an open-text option.

script.question_text: Which of the following benefits would motivate you to participate in the wellness program? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the corporate wellness program to a colleague?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale. This question can serve as a Net Promoter Score (NPS) proxy.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend the corporate wellness program to a colleague?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: What additional wellness activities would you like to see included in the program?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text with character limit.

script.question_text: What additional wellness activities would you like to see included in the program?
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.

questions.question_text: How often do you typically participate in wellness program activities?
questions.routing_logic: This question appears if respondent selects at least one activity in Q2.
questions.client_notes: Use a frequency scale to measure participation. Include a 'Never' option for non-participants.

script.question_text: How often do you typically participate in wellness program activities?
script.routing_logic: This question appears if respondent selects at least one activity in Q2.

questions.question_text: Do you feel the wellness program has positively impacted your overall well-being?
answer_options: No, it has negatively impacted my well-being
questions.routing_logic: This question appears if respondent selects at least one activity in Q2.
questions.client_notes: Use a 4-point scale to measure perceived impact. Include an option for negative impact.

script.question_text: Do you feel the wellness program has positively impacted your overall well-being?
answer_options: No, it has negatively impacted my well-being
script.routing_logic: This question appears if respondent selects at least one activity in Q2.

questions.question_text: What is your preferred method of receiving information about wellness program activities?
answer_options: Posters or flyers in the office
questions.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option for additional preferences. Randomize the order of options.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons with an open-text option.

script.question_text: What is your preferred method of receiving information about wellness program activities?
answer_options: Posters or flyers in the office
script.routing_logic: This question appears for all respondents.
